duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide information and support to employees regarding HR policies, regulations, and general inquiries.
Maintain and update personnel files, databases, and logs/reports in compliance with HR requirements.
Process employee status changes, input personnel/position changes, and update relevant information in computerized databases.
Provide assistance and information to employees, applicants, and other agencies on HR functions, activities, and services.
Conduct background checks, including education, professional registration, employment, references, passport verifications and Global Watchlist screening.
Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders, and ensure compliance with local, state, and federal/national statutes and guidelines.
